The Quranic researcher sings his money, that is: he does not dispense with him that what is navigated or anything that he sings from (P-150) is his money, which he is stingy to it on the authority of it.Rose, which is destruction, said by Mujahid.It was said: He was redeemed in the dug.Qatada and Abu Salih said: He wanted to hell; That is, he fell and said a people: He wanted to shroud from calling, and it is a fennel from his death and his destruction.
